amendment.description: To provide that nothing in the joint resolution may be construed as authorizing the use of military force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 193 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 193 proposed by Senator Lee for Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S1829-1835; text: CR S1829) To provide that nothing in the joint resolution may be construed as authorizing the use of military force.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 193 proposed by Senator Lee for Senator Paul.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 193 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
